text: Jacqueline Veuve (29 January 1930 – 18 April 2013) was a Swiss filmmaker known for "ethnographical cinema". She has been referred to as the "great lady of the Swiss documentary film."Visions du Réel tribute She received an honorary Swiss Film Award in 2013.Swiss Film Award site == References == == External links == *Jacqueline Veuve site * Category:Swiss documentary film directors Category:Swiss ethnologists Category:Women ethnologists Category:Swiss women film directors Category:1930 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Women documentary filmmakers
title: Jacqueline Veuve
